member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW
member.summary: Contains information specific to an NM_CUSTOMDRAW (list view) notification code sent by a list-view control.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.nmcd
member.summary: structure that contains general custom draw information.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.clrText
member.summary: COLORREF value representing the color that will be used to display text foreground in the list-view control.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.clrTextBk
member.summary: COLORREF value representing the color that will be used to display text background in the list-view control. In Version 6.0., this member is ignored if the background image is set with the LVM_SETBKIMAGE message.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.iSubItem
member.summary: Version 4.71. Index of the subitem that is being drawn. If the main item is being drawn, this member will be zero.

summary.para: Version 6.0. DWORD that contains the type of the item to draw. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: An item is to be drawn.
A group is to be drawn.
Every item is to be drawn.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.clrFace
member.summary: Version 6.0. COLORREF value representing the color that will be used to display the face of an item.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.iIconEffect
member.summary: Version 6.0. Value of type int that specifies the effect that is applied to an icon, such as Glow, Shadow, or Pulse.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.iIconPhase
member.summary: Version 6.0. Value of type int that specifies the phase of an icon.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.iPartId
member.summary: Version 6.0. Value of type int that specifies the ID of the part of an item to draw.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.iStateId
member.summary: Version 6.0. Value of type int that specifies the ID of the state of an item to draw.

member.name: NMLVCUSTOMDRAW.rcText
member.summary: Version 6.0. RECT that specifies the rectangle in which the text is to be drawn.

summary.para: Version 6.0. UINT that specifies how a group should be aligned. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Align the group on the left.
Align the group on the right.
